item.title: Tinker v. Des Moines
item.description: Oral Argument Argued -> November 12, 1968 Decided -> Feb 24, 1969 Petitioner -> Tinker Docket -> 21 Decided by Warren Court About -> Freedom of Speech Verdict -> Positive Personal Opinon -> Agree Tinker V. Des Moines | Oyez Does a prohibition against the wearing of armbands in public school, as a form of symbolic protest, violate the studentsâ€™ freedom of speech protections guaranteed by the First Amendment? yes
